summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll and Local Improvement District No. 6214 for the improvement of West 67th Street from approximately 100 feet west of 35th Ave. Northwest to Seaview Ave.; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88564, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
